DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety immunogenicity booster dose two vaccine use prevent Haemophilus influenzae type b infection child 12-18 month age .
DOC.brief_title: Study Toddlers ( 12-18 Months ) Comparing Booster Dose Vaxem Hib Hiberix Vaccines Prevention Haemophilus Influenzae Type b Infections China
DOC.criteria: Toddlers 1218 month age previously participate study M37P2 . Prior Hib booster administration . History serious reaction ( ) follow vaccination . Vaccination within 14 day study vaccination . Known suspected immune impairment . For additional entry criterion please refer protocol .
